desc: Filtration Technology: Activated Carbon, Activated Charcoal, HEPA-Type, Ionizer, UV Light (Sterilizer). Contaminants Captured: Allergens, Bacteria, Chemicals, Cough & Sneeze Debris, Debris, Dust, Exhaust Pollution, Industrial Pollution, Odors, Pet Dander, Pollen, Smog Particles, Tobacco Smoke, Viruses.
